titleStmt.title: The sick souls salue. By William Sclater. Batchelar of Diuinity and minister of the word of God at Pitmister in Somerset
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The sicke soules salue.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
